headline: Enerin raises €15 million Series A to industrialise modular high-temperature heat pumps for global industry
summary: ASKER, Norway, November 26, 2025--Enerin, a technology leader in high-temperature heat pumps, has raised €15 million (NOK 180 million) in a Series A led by Climentum Capital, The Footprint Firm, Johnson Controls and Move Energy, with participation from PSV Hafnium and Momentum.
